carpet.rule.flameArrowDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with flame to shoot flaming arrows
carpet.rule.powerArrowDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with power to shoot more powerful arrows
carpet.rule.punchArrowDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with punch to shoot arrows with more knockback
carpet.rule.infinityArrowDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with infinity to not consume arrows on fire
carpet.rule.silkTouchTntDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with silk touch to dispense tnt that silk touched blown up blocks
carpet.rule.fortuneTntDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with fortune to dispense tnt that fortunes blown up blocks
carpet.rule.lootingTntDispenser.desc: Allows dispensers enchanted with looting to dispense tnt that loots killed mobs
